text: awlma 'asabatkum -ayha almwmnwn- msybt, wahi ma 'usyb minkum yawm "'uhd" qad 'asabtum mithlayha min almushrikin fi yawm "bdr", qultum mtejbyn: kayf yakun hdha wanahn muslimun warasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam fina whwla' mshrkwn? qul lahum -ayha alnby-: hdha aldhy 'asabakum hu min eind 'anfusikum bsbb mkhalftkm amr rasulakum w'iqbalkm ealaa jame alghnaym. 'iina allah yafeal ma yasha' wyhkm ma yryd, la meqqib ‌‌‌‌lhkmh
